title: Ruth Farmer. A story
author: Marchbank, Agnes.
snippet: For Davie never let anyshy feeling prevent him from entering any of hisneighbours' houses when he had a mind to. He hadeven explored the Bank House one day, and foundout to his satisfaction how the bolt worked that wasbetween the bank agent's bedroom and the strongroom downstairs. Indeed, wherever he made up hismind to go there he went, and when found in anyout-of-the-way-corner people laughed and said, " It'sonly Davie."
